title: New loading screen?
body: I think riot should update the loading screen when loading into game. Since there is mostly always a guy that has the super slow pc which takes really long and it gets boring. I was think maybe they can try making it look nicer or add a chat box for people to talk or anything that makes it more interesting. Anyone got any ideas to make the loading screen less boring.

If you haven't seen the fan made ones check them out they look really good.  ( Note - These are just ideas / videos nothing you can actually put into the game )

I actually really like those! With the animated splash art, maybe there would be an option to turn it off, to just have the static images (so those with slower computers are able to get in game faster perhaps?)

I'm all for making it look nicer, that's a good idea.

Adding a chatbox however would make the player with the "super slow pc" even slower, and it would give the others the ability to flame the living hell out of that player.

What about doing something with those Did You Know tips? For example, what if they'd switch every 20 seconds or so.

Right now it's not coded to do that. There may or may not be enough tips, I don't know.

would love to see this happen considering the new looks in loading screens for shurima and poro king, chatbox wouldnt always be necessary since there are some matches where people load up in 5 seconds. perhaps have a birds-eye view of the summoners rift map in the background? or maybe even baron/ dragon in the middle. i'm all for it

I think they should have the 3D models of all of the champs in use on either side of the screen. Like: Team 1 vs Team 2

Just have them idle and put into their team groups with the summoner names below their feet, it would make things more interesting when a game loads. Smaller champs in the front, larger ones up the back.

why not just animate the back ground? having an animation to look at would brighten up the mood, keep you atleast shortly distracted and also might even *interest* you heh.

or of course we could do it old school and have pacman on the loading screen

Make it a togglable option. Off by default.

I often think about this, one of the ideas that could be implemented into the loading screen, could be the old match history details(for those who don't know I'm talking way back around July last year where you could see the kdr/items built and basic stats), before the expanded match history was released and you have to visit the website to view. I was thinking like a small circle button in the top right of a champions splash art corner which could turn green when your click on it, showing previous matches kdr and champion played and such, or the old match history as i stated. 
Discuss and consider.

~sparklefart

Wouldn't make it longer to load?

It would slow down the loading speed, here's why:

The client, while loading, would need to send a request to the server and then wait for a response with the match history details. This causes extra load on your CPU, causing the load to be slower. The load is small, but can be impactful regardless.

Alt + Tab
Open up a web browser
Enjoy
